item.title: The making of
item.description: So here’s the thing about the thing ; <<>> DiG 9.11.3-1ubuntu1.1-Ubuntu <<>> NS grubernet.es @1.1.1.1 ;; global options: +cmd ;; Got answer: ;; ->>HEADER<<- opcode: QUERY, status: NXDOMAIN, id: 32262 ;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1 ;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION: ; EDNS: version: 0, flags:; udp: 1452 ;; QUESTION SECTION: ;grubernet.es. IN NS ;; AUTHORITY SECTION: es. 86400 IN SOA ns1.nic.es. hostmaster.nic.es. 2019010505 7200 7200 2592000 86400 ;; Query time: 7 msec ;; SERVER: 1.
